physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a multi-storey building. It comes with a portico and two sets of balustrades attached to the columns adorn it. There are numerous potted plants and a bench can be seen at the foreground towards the left hand side of the photograph.
